description: Olympic champion Jade Jones wins the -57kg final at the Swiss Open in Montreux after a golden-point victory.
title: Jade Jones earns golden-point win in Swiss Open final
title_page: Jade Jones earns golden-point win in Swiss Open final - BBC Sport
maintext:
Britain's Jade Jones remains unbeaten in 2015 after a golden-point victory over Nikita Glasnovic in the -57kg final at the Swiss Open in Montreux.
Jones, 21, fell 8-0 down against the 20-year-old Swede but rallied to level at 9-9 before taking the win.
"I was 8-0 down and couldn't see out of one eye," the world number two said. "It felt like I was in a Rocky movie."
